title: Low FPS in RGMs Only
body:
Title. Basically, whenever I go to play a RGM that isn't based in Summoner's Rift I get 3-9 FPS max per game. In normal games, I get 30-40 FPS, which is fine because I actually see what I am doing, etc. 

For example, I experience low FPS in Ascension, but I don't experience low FPS in URF, One for All, etc. I only experience low FPS in RGMs that are not based in Summoner's Rift. 

Ex. Ascension, Invasion, etc. 

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: That is a super low frame rate, I'm sorry about that.  :(  There could be a game asset for ranked not rendering properly, or a coincidence showing up as just ranked.  Try the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up as well as our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in case your game files needs some repairs.  Test it in a custom and let me know if that helps.
